Description: Targets back independently to fix imbalances.
Proper Form: Kneel; anchor band with foot; row with opposite hand.

Description: Performed as a hold/rep to recruit hip stabilizers.
Proper Form: Lie on back; band above knees; lift hips high.

Description: Isolation movement targeting glutes via lateral lift.
Proper Form: On all fours; band above knees; lift leg out to side.

Description: Combines hinge balance with a row for posture.
Proper Form: Balance on one leg; hinge; row at the bottom.

Description: Amplifies bridge benefits by adding explosive resistance.
Proper Form: Explosive hip extension against band tension.

Description: Standing isolation extending leg out behind you.
Proper Form: Band at ankles; kick leg back; keep torso upright.

Description: Portable way to target triceps through full range.
Proper Form: One hand at shoulder; other presses down to lockout.

Description: Compound move using band for hip abduction.
Proper Form: Shoulders on bench; drive hips; push knees out.

Description: Targets deltoids and upper back for aesthetics.
Proper Form: Hold band overhead; pull arms out into a "Y."

Description: Challenges hip abduction and lateral stability.
Proper Form: Band at ankles; half-squat; step sideways.

Description: Isolates biceps while engaging kneeling core.
Proper Form: Kneel; anchor band under knee; curl to shoulder.

Description: Forces recruitment to prevent knee collapse.
Proper Form: Band above knees; squat deep; push knees out.

Description: Classic PT move for hip and pelvic health.
Proper Form: Side-lying; lift top knee; feet stay together.

Description: Variable tension increases difficulty vs DBs.
Proper Form: Anchor band at hip; raise other arm out to side.

Description: Challenges core/flexors via resisted lifts.
Proper Form: Lie on back; band at ankles; lift one at a time.

Description: Alternating sides increases core time under tension.
Proper Form: Same as rank 14, but switch arms each rep.

Description: Intensifies lunge by adding stabilizer tension.
Proper Form: Band above knees; step into lunge; resist pull.

Description: Isolates outer glute and hip muscles.
Proper Form: Side-lying; legs straight; lift top leg high.

Description: Improves posture by strengthening rear delts.
Proper Form: Hold band at chest height; pull arms back.

Description: Increases resistance during resisted crunch.
Proper Form: Legs up; band at ankles; reach for toes.

Description: Intensifies challenge on lower abs/flexors.
Proper Form: Lie on back; band at ankles; lift both together.

Description: Combines plyometrics with resistance.
Proper Form: Squat deep; explosively jump; land softly.

Description: Enhances hip extension with a lunge kickback.
Proper Form: Perform lunge; kick back leg out at the top.

Description: Challenges core while firing the glute.
Proper Form: High plank; lift one leg; keep hips level.

Description: High-intensity move with resisted knee drive.
Proper Form: High plank; band on feet; drive knees to chest.

Description: Focuses on shoulder blade movement.
Proper Form: Hold band in front; pull shoulder blades together.

Description: Complex plank lifting limbs against a tug.
Proper Form: In plank; move one limb outward in a circle.

Description: Essential for improving sprint knee drive.
Proper Form: Band on feet; pull one knee to chest.

Description: Intensifies flutter kick for activation.
Proper Form: Lie on back; legs straight; fast up/down kicks.

Description: Standing isolation for flexors and quads.
Proper Form: Band on feet; lift knee to hip height.

Description: Addresses strength imbalances between sides.
Proper Form: Hold bridge; lift one leg; alternate sides.

Description: Enhances mobility via circular motions.
Proper Form: Same as hydrant but move knee in large circles.

Description: Engages hips/glutes more than standard lunge.
Proper Form: Step foot back and across; keep knee stable.
